page_title: ShareBlackScreen - Unlock the Game of Focus
more_features: Want to experience more premium features?
hero_subtitle: Multi-functional screen management tool that makes focus enjoyable
hero_description: ShareBlackScreen helps you reduce distractions, protect your vision, improve focus, and through social sharing features, makes focus a shareable experience.
free_start: Start Your Focus Journey for Free
pain_points_title: Do you often face these problems?
eye_fatigue_desc: Long screen time causes dry eyes, fatigue, and even headaches
distraction_desc: Social media notifications and email alerts constantly interrupt your workflow
time_management_desc: Unable to effectively plan and track focus time, resulting in low efficiency
lack_motivation_desc: Focusing alone lacks motivation, making it difficult to maintain good habits
solution_description: ShareBlackScreen combines screen management, time tracking, and social motivation to create a complete focus ecosystem.
protect_vision_desc: Multiple screen modes reduce blue light damage and relieve eye fatigue
boost_focus_desc: Block distractions and create an ideal focus environment
time_management_feature_desc: Built-in Pomodoro technique optimizes work-rest cycles
social_motivation_desc: Focus with friends and motivate each other to improve
features_title: Gamified Features to Enhance Focus Experience
black_screen_desc: Provides a pure black screen to reduce visual distractions
color_mode_desc: Supports multiple color options (black, white, blue, green, etc.)
transparency_desc: Allows users to adjust screen transparency (0%-100%)
timer_desc: Set automatic screen mode switching time
custom_time_desc: Allows users to create personalized time management plans
focus_reminder_desc: Smart reminders for breaks and resuming focus
share_focus_status_desc: Share your current focus status to social media
focus_groups_desc: Create or join focus groups to stay focused with friends
leaderboard_desc: Display focus time rankings among friends
achievement_system_desc: Unlock focus achievements and receive virtual rewards
habit_analysis_desc: Analyze user focus patterns and optimal focus periods
goal_setting_desc: Set focus time goals and track completion
progress_visualization_desc: Visually display focus progress through charts
testimonials_subtitle: Focus experience sharing from real users
pricing_title: Choose a Focus Plan That Fits You
pricing_subtitle: Flexible pricing plans to meet different needs
cookie_consent: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze website traffic, and provide personalized content. By continuing to use this website, you agree to our Cookie Policy.
